Caskets are a possible catch from fishing at the reward pool with the reward permits gained from subduing Tempoross.

Possible rewards[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 180,165 caskets from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average casket opening is worth 12,498.27.
